info.title: Google Custom Search
info.description: Search the web using Google Custom Search JSON API. Returns title, link, and snippet for search results. Usage: Set Authorization to 'Bearer' and enter 'YOUR_API_KEY;YOUR_CX' (separated by a semicolon) in the Auth Token field.

get.description: Search for a query using Google Custom Search.

parameters.name: num
parameters.description: Number of search results to return (1-10). Default is 5.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The index of the first result to return.
